extensionDescription.message: Enables you to classify opened tabs freely and switch tab easily by tab lists displayed on a board.

closeTabConfirm.message: Is it OK to close this tab?

configItemOldTabBefore.message: Change background color of tabs which haven't been accessed more than

configItemLastTab.message: Change background color of a tab which is opened just before to green

configItemNewTab.message: Change background color of tabs which are newly opened to yellow

configItemCloseTab.message: Confirm when a tab is closing

configItemRemoveList.message: Confirm when a list is removing

configResetConfirm.message:
All information about tab lists will be deleted.
Opened tabs won't be closed.
